template:
{{ title }}

{{ subtitle }}

name: Conference description
Conference Title
template:
{% set conference = frappe.db.sql("SELECT title, subtitle, venu, date FROM `tabConference` where title = %(title)s and year=%(year)s ", args, as_dict=true )%}

{{ conference[0].title }}

{{ conference[0].subtitle }}

{{ conference[0].date }} | {{ conference[0].venu }}

name: Conference Sponsors
Conference Partners
Conference Venu
Conference Volunteers
template:
Volunteers

Folks running the show behind the scenes.

{% set volunteers = frappe.db.sql("SELECT m.full_name, m.photo, m.short_intro FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Volunteers` v on c.name = v.parent inner JOIN `tabConference Members` as m on v.member = m.name where c.title = %(title)s and c.year=%(year)s group by m.name", args, as_dict=true )%} {% if volunteers %}
{% for volunteer in volunteers%}
{{ volunteer.full_name }}
{{ volunteer.short_intro }}.
{% endfor %}
{% endif %}
